subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Yanic Perreault scored 2 minutes 29 seconds into overtime last night and the Phoenix Coyotes rallied from a three-goal deficit in the third period to defeat the Thrashers, 5-4 in Atlanta. Shane Doan had two goals for Phoenix, which has won five in a row.
